author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
What's Adam Savage's position on flathead screws? What's the best strategy to get your name out as a freelancer? In setting up a workshop, should tools and stock be stored together or separately? In this live stream excerpt, Adam answers these questions from Tested members Patrick Hennessy, Greg Stanton and ADHDMedia, whom we thank for their support. Do you have any thoughts on any of the three questions in this video? 

00:00 Flathead screw controversy
04:28 Freelancing
06:31 Tools vs stock
Shop infrastructure playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9eKYsbFOjNk&list=PLJtitKU0CAegGi2QUH6ywt4EkjcR0jVam

Savage Merchandi
title: Why Adam Savage Hates Flathead Screws
